entry.string: Please enter a valid location id or zip code.
entry.translation: Pleese-a inter a feleed luceshun id oor zeep cude-a.

entry.string: Please enter a valid License Key or Visit http://www.weather.com/services/xmloap.html and sign-up for thier xoapXML Services.
entry.translation: Pleese-a inter a feleed Leecense-a Key oor Feesit http://www.weather.com/services/xmloap.html und seegn-up fur theeer xuepXML Serfeeces. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Please enter a valid Partner ID or Visit http://www.weather.com/services/xmloap.html and sign-up for thier xoapXML Services.
entry.translation: Pleese-a inter a feleed Pertner ID oor Feesit http://www.weather.com/services/xmloap.html und seegn-up fur theeer xuepXML Serfeeces. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: An Error Occured while Processing Your Request
entry.translation: Un Irrur Ooccoored vheele-a Prucesseeng Yuoor Reqooest

entry.string: A likely cause for this is that the location you specified was not found
entry.translation: A leekely coose-a fur thees is thet zee luceshun yuoo speceeffied ves nut fuoond
